text:
A very Kind, sincere, dedicated doctor whom always care for the well being of all.

Even all and every staff in the clinic we met are so nice that they make you feels like a family that you can entrust them.

My sisterâ€™s oncologist, thank you Dr Lim and not forgetting all the nurses for taking such good care of my sister Hwee Noi.

Thank you for being the sun that brightens up the lives of all and all of you shall be blessed.

Dr Lim is a compassionate and highly skilled doctor and Novena Cancer Centre have a group of caring and professional nurses.

Highly recommended!!!
Experienced Team of Healthcare Doctor and Nurses. Always feel welcomed and warmth of Novena Cancer Centre healthcare team!

Caring staff and nurses who will ensure your every visits are a heart warming and cosy one
Keep up the good work! :)
